question: Who is the author of the book 'A Great Association-Glimpses into the Life of Swami Bhoomananda Tirtha'?
explanation: The book titled \'A Great Association-Glimpses into the Life of Swami Bhoomananda Tirtha\' has been authored by Swami Nirviseshananda Tirtha. It was recently released by Prasar Bharati\'s CEO Shashi Shekar Vempati and Sreedharan. A book written on the life of Swami Bhoomananda Tirtha,  the renowned saint of Narayanashrama Tapovanam of Kerala, is an outcome of the fundamental principle of \'guru-shishya parampara\' and the spiritual \'saadhana\' of the author.
